Server.Core

Class SchemaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.Core.SchemaData

  • public class SchemaData
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information associated with a Relax NG Schema file. This information is used for system provided schemas as well as user supplied schemas. Used by SchemaList to provide Vicar with a list to display in a select list.
    Version:
    0.8, 12/15/2012
    Author:
    Frank Smutniak, Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, http://cdrh.unl.edu
    See Also:
    SchemaList

      Constructor for initializing all values.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the schema file.
        Returns:
        The name of the schema file.

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Returns the path of the schema file.
        Returns:
        The path of the schema file.

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Returns the type of the schema file. The type is 1 for system provided schemas and 2 for user supplied schemas. (This information is specific to the implementation of SchemaList.)
        Returns:
        The type of the schema file.

      • getCurrent

        public int getCurrent()
        Returns the status of this particular Schema. This information is set by SchemaList.
        Returns:
        1 if this is the currently selected schema, 0 otherwise.

      • getComment

        public java.lang.String getComment()
        Returns a text comment describing this particular schema. This is for use in a tool tip text style comment produced by hovering the mouse above the schema name in the select list.
        Returns:
        Text comment describing the schema.

      • getURL

        public java.lang.String getURL()
        Reserved for future use in case schemas are accessible via URL.
        Returns:
        The URL of the schema file.
